Robe of the Sea

armor (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 221
armor id [armor]: 230 (Magic Robes)
protection, body [protbody]: 3
magic bonus [boosters]: +W
water breathing [waterbreathing]: 1
(air-breathing [airbr])

Requires 15W to forge (W3)

A Water mage who wears this robe will find that it helps him in the use of Water magic. This robe makes it possible for anyone wearing it to breathe under water and on land.
